data.name: Review, prioritize, and create a development plan that can be managed in the repoo
BRAINSTORM: How might you incorporate testing to cover the current state of the hockey analytics project?
Fix bug where sometimes clicking the current game in the URL doesn't reload data as expected
data.notes:
This bug may be fixed with https://app.asana.com/1/9284095956886/task/1212223034069913 - but see if you can cause it to repro.


Bug Repro

Use https://sploosh-ai-hockey-analytics.vercel.app/?gameId=2025020248 as an example. If I load the page and click another game to view play-by-play data, sometimes clicking back on the original game (in this case SEA @ DAL on 11/9/25) doesn't load anything and just shows the animated Zambonis on the ice.

data.name: Fix bug where goalie pulled situations appear as PPG or SHG
data.notes:
Reproduce using https://sploosh-ai-hockey-analytics.vercel.app/?gameId=2025020164 for reference. The third Kraken goal in that game was not a PPG but rather a goal scored with our goalie pulled for the extra attacker.

Similarly, use https://sploosh-ai-hockey-analytics.vercel.app/?gameId=2025020308 for an example where the Kraken pulled their goalie and Detroit tallied the empty net goal - appearing as SHG.

data.name: Improve UX to display the game header and shot chart plus details above the fold where possible in our responsive layout
Improve UX by adding an ability to easily change the timezone for the app as a local setting
Improve markers on shot chart with custom graphics or artwork
data.notes: For example, if we use the hockey stick emoji for shots on goal, we can probably avoid the issue where team colors/dots are too close to rink markings.

data.name: Improve UX so game header display 0 SOG instead of nothing
Improve UX when game data errors or fails to load in the sidebar
Improve UX when game data errors or fails to load in the main page
Fix bug in timeline UX where the last SHG was also an empty net goal
Improve timeline UX to display an image similar to the placeholder upcoming rink for where an event took place on the rink
Consider implementing a playlist-like feature to view all goal replays in succession - perhaps updating a mini-scoreboard or some other cool way of visualizing it
Consider improving sidebar UX to "shuffle" final games toward the bottom of the list when complete
Initial implementation of Vercel analytics and event tracking
Add QR codes to share the home page as well as selected game and NHL Game Center links
Add a hat or symbol to indicate hat trick(s) in a game
data.notes:
Use https://sploosh-ai-hockey-analytics.vercel.app/?gameId=2025020160 with Bedard scoring his first NHL hat trick 

Hat trick data also exists for Bedard (2nd hat trick) and Celebrini (3rd hat trick)

data.name: BRAINSTORM: Create a visualization showing home games for the selected day
data.notes: Canada and USA should be sufficient for most cases, but we do want to show the world when international games are being played - such as on 2025.11.14 üá∏üá™ Pittsburgh Penguins vs. Nashville Predators (Global Series Sweden)

VERIFY: Shootout game with three skaters on each team
Create a visualization that starts with all 32 teams having an equal shot/weight
data.notes: Similar to Moneypuck and the playoff circle with teams and likelihood of making the playoffs, it'd be cool to create a visualization where all 32 teams start with equal weight (or no weight). Perhaps able to be viewed as a whole for all 32 teams, by conference, by division, etc. It'd be nice to step through day-by-day.

‚ÄºÔ∏è Upgrade to Next.js v16.0.7 or later to address CVE-2025-55182
Fix bug reported by Mike Hackworth where game data doesn't load in a long-running window
data.notes:
Mike Hackworth reported a bug where game data seemed to be stuck either loading the Zambonis as a placeholder or just quietly stuck when trying to view game and shot chart details for today's Washington Capitals game - https://sploosh-ai-hockey-analytics.vercel.app/?gameId=2025020386

Per Mike:
I just opened the website for the Caps and got it again.

https://app.asana.com/app/asana/-/get_asset?asset_id=1212223034069916

Closing the window reset and it came back.  I keep the window chrome open all the time if that matters.

data.name: Create a shell script that can be run from a package.json helper script to grab NHL games and results for a specified date
data.notes: Use today's date as a default value if no command-line argument is specified.

subtasks.name: Fix a bug where the new NHL schedule script is displaying incorrect start times

parent.name: Create a shell script that can be run from a package.json helper script to grab NHL games and results for a specified date

data.name: Upgrade Node.js v22 to v24
data.notes:
https://nodejs.org/en/blog/migrations/v22-to-v24

With the release of¬†Node.js 24.11.0, the Node.js 24 release line has entered Long-Term Support (LTS) and will continue to receive updates through to the end of April 2028.  Please create a new branch so we can review the guide at https://nodejs.org/en/blog/migrations/v22-to-v24 and then see if we can upgrade to Node.js v24 in our project.  Do we need to upgrade our local Node.js version, too? We can and should if v24 is going to be LTS.   Let's do fresh builds of any Dockerized services or applications with the latest LTS version of Node.js and verify our project works as expected.  Sure would be nice if we had tests to validate our application before we went down this path, eh lol

Fix bug in Game Timeline where penalties count doesn't match identified penalties
data.notes:
Using http://localhost:3000/?gameId=2025020094 to reproduce, notice how if we have the 3rd period selected and goals selected, we have 0 goals and 6 penalties identified in event type, but under "No events to display" it shows 0 goals and 0 penalties.
